hero.description: Up and down english provides real-life English and Fluency training. We focus on speaking confidently in everyday situations. Open for 1:1 sessions and online classes.

methods.name: Direct Method
methods.description: Focusing on the language in use, rather than the language as a system. Learning to communicate effectively and naturally.

methods.name: Flipped Classroom
methods.description: Receiving materials before the lesson to get acquainted with the topic, allowing for active participation and better understanding during the meeting.

methods.name: Active Practice and Repetition
methods.description: Regularly returning to previous lessons and focusing on active practice, repetition, and building lasting language habits so that knowledge is not forgotten.

methods.name: Modern and Thematic Materials
methods.description: Using self-created materials or modern sources like Linguahouse, which offer interesting, thematic lessons based on the current language.

about.title: Who is behind Up and Down English?
about.subtitle: Kamil Bu≈ºek - Qualified english teacher
about.details: I am a Master's degree holder in English Philology with a specialization in Linguistics. I have been teaching English for over 5 years.

cards.title: Teaching Experience
cards.description: Over 5 years of experience teaching English to adults. I've worked in various Warsaw language schools, gaining expertise in the Communicative Approach, Task-Based Learning, and the Callan Method.
details: ‚ú® Callan Method: a fast-paced, interactive approach focused on speech and correction.

cards.title: Influences
cards.description: My teaching philosophy is heavily influenced by my travels, especially my time in Los Angeles. This experience taught me the importance of teaching practical, real-life English over 'textbook' language.
details: My time in Los Angeles taught me to focus on practical, real-life English that is actually used by native speakers.

cards.title: Hobbies
cards.description: Beyond teaching, I am a professional dancer. This passion has led to collaborations with well-known artists and an appearance on the TV show 'Dancing with the Stars' ('Taniec z Gwiazdami').
